tool.name: Map your protein list on a reference interactome
tool.command:
#if $inputtype.filetype == "copy_paste": Rscript --vanilla $__tool_directory__/interactomicsCyJS.R --inputtype copypaste --input '$inputtype.genelist' --column c1 --interactome '$interactome' --jsonoutput '$outputjson' --taboutput '$condtabfile.taboutput' --interactometype '${interactome.fields.dbkey}' --addReactome '$addReactome' --reactomeFile $__tool_directory__/UniProt2Reactome.txt #end if
#if $inputtype.filetype == "file_all": Rscript --vanilla $__tool_directory__/interactomicsCyJS.R --inputtype tabfile --input '$inputtype.genelist' --column '$inputtype.column' --interactome '$interactome' --jsonoutput '$outputjson' --taboutput '$condtabfile.taboutput' --interactometype '${interactome.fields.dbkey}' --addReactome '$addReactome' --reactomeFile $__tool_directory__/UniProt2Reactome.txt
#end if
#if $inputtype.filetype == "file_list": Rscript --vanilla $__tool_directory__/interactomicsCyJS.R --inputtype tabfile --input '$inputtype.genelist' --column c1 --interactome '$interactome' --jsonoutput '$outputjson' --taboutput '$condtabfile.taboutput' --interactometype '${interactome.fields.dbkey}' --addReactome '$addReactome' --reactomeFile $__tool_directory__/UniProt2Reactome.txt
#end if

param.name: filetype
param.label: Select your type of input file
param.help: The input file must contain Uniprot Accession IDs. If it is not the case, please refer to the mapping component.

param.name: genelist
param.label: Choose a single-column file
param.help: This file must have only 1 column containing IDs - For the type of IDs, please refer to the documentation below.

param.name: genelist
param.label: Choose a multiple-columns file
param.help: This file must imperatively have 1 column filled with IDs consistent with the database that will be used. Please use the MappingIDs component if this is not the case.

param.name: column
param.label: Please specify the column where you would like to apply the comparison

param.name: interactome
param.label: Choose a reference interactome to map on

param.name: taboutput
param.label: Generate an additional tabular file of the network
